Allow coupon entry
Enable coupon entry for customers and guests

Require Payment Address
Require payment address selection for customers and guests

Require Phone Number
Require phone number entry from customer or guest specific to the order

Guest Checkout Create Account
Offer guests to create the accounts at the end of the checkout. This is transparent to guests and email will be sent with login details.

Hide "Add to Cart" Button
If you need to allow only simple checkout, you can disable standard add to cart buttons

Checkout View Mode:
Can be "window" (This means checkout process will be on another web-page) or "Modal" (checkout process will run on the same page without redirecting)
